channel.title: Inferential Statistics on Main
channel.description: Recent content in Inferential Statistics on Main

item.title: Project 1: Generalized Linear Model
item.description: This is a project I did on the “Shock Dataset” which was provided during my Generalized Linear Models course. This projects includes my R output and My Statistical inference / analysis. I’m proud to say that I got the maximum grade on this course. This project includes: A description of the Data Preliminary & exploratory analysis Distribution exploration Correlation Matrix boxplots Formulation of the GLIM Model fitting, Diagnostics & Outlier Detection Here’s a Preview image:

item.title: Project 2: Categorical Data Analysis
item.description: This is a project I did with Dekel Karp and Dylan Vialla during my BSc at HUJI .This project was done on a purely Categorical Data set using the “Insight” software which was created by Prof. Zvi Gilula from HUJI’s Statistics & Data Science department. Prof. Zvi Gilula has created this software using R. The output provided is from the “insight” software. This was a very complicated project, especially because of the P_Values.
